title:
A classification of the division algebras that are isotopic to a cyclic
  Galois field extension
comments:
The last section of previous version has been removed, the rest is
  rewritten
abstract:
We classify all division algebras that are principal Albert isotopes of a
cyclic Galois field extension of degree $n>2$ up to isomorphisms. We achieve a
``tight'' classification when the cyclic Galois field extension is cubic. The
classification is ``tight'' in the sense that the list of algebras has features
that make it easy to distinguish non-isomorphic ones.
